synopsis.text: All his life, Kenta Akagi has known the quaint familiarity of his hometown, Lutzheim, where he works as a pizza delivery boy. Adventures, wars, and foreign lands are mere tales to him, until a mysterious girl enters his life. This enigmatic young lady, feared by many, stirs up memories within Kenta that he can't quite place. Driven by a newfound resolve, Kenta vows to protect her at all costs, embarking on a journey that transcends the boundaries of his mundane life. Based on a manga by Hakoda Maki, this thrilling anime brings to life the extraordinary tale of a pizza delivery boy turned unlikely hero.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
